sentences.en: Broughton took a sickie on Monday to paint his fence.
sentences.cn: 布劳顿星期一称病请了一天假来粉刷栅栏。

sentences.en: Every tree, wall and fence stood out against dazzling white fields.
sentences.cn: 每棵树、每堵墙和每道栅栏都在白得耀眼的田野映衬下十分夺目。

sentences.en: He squeezed through a narrow opening in the fence.
sentences.cn: 他从围栏上的狭窄缺口里挤了过去。

sentences.en: He was putting up a new fence at his home.
sentences.cn: 他正在为自己家搭建新的篱笆墙。

sentences.en: I was over the fence in double-quick time.
In University Square workmen are building a steel fence.
sentences.cn: 在大学广场上，工人们正在修建钢栅栏。

sentences.en: it's over the fence, the way you've been carrying on.
The exhibition hall reared above me behind a high fence.
sentences.cn: 高高的围墙后面，展览大厅耸立在我面前。

sentences.en: The fence was very strongly built, with very large posts.
sentences.cn: 围栏用粗大的木桩建成，非常坚固。

sentences.en: The plane veered off the runway and careered through the perimeter fence.
sentences.cn: 飞机突然偏离跑道，高速冲过了周围的护栏。

sentences.en: The small churchyard was surrounded by a rusted wrought-iron fence.
sentences.cn: 不大的教堂墓地周边围着一圈生锈的熟铁栅栏。

sentences.en: The surrounding land was enclosed by an eight foot wire fence.
sentences.cn: 周围的土地围有8英尺高的铁丝栅栏。

sentences.en: The thieves cut a hole in the fence.
sentences.cn: 盗贼在篱笆上割了个洞。
这个木栅栏是可移动的。

sentences.en: They are sitting on the fence and refusing to commit themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们保持中立，拒绝表态。

sentences.en: Villagers say the fence would restrict public access to the hills.
sentences.cn: 村民们说这个围栏将限制公众进入山区。

sentences.en: whatever side of the fence you are on, the issue is here to stay.
sentences.cn: 不管你站在哪一方，问题总是存在的。

words.tran_cn: 击剑者；剑术家；（澳）篱笆匠
剑术；围墙；筑栅栏的材料

phrases.tran_cn: 未表态的，中立的：未决定支持双方中的某一方的；未表态的或中立的
(澳/新西兰，非正式)不可理喻的，不合理的；难以接受的；过分的
避免作选择（或决定）；做骑墙派；犹豫观望

trans.tran_cn: 栅栏，赛马障碍物，销赃者
trans.tran_en: a structure made of wood, metal etc that surrounds a piece of land
to answer someone’s questions in a clever way in order to get an advantage in an argument
